name: Basic Flanger
description: This is an implementation of a typical flanger pedal
left-pot-function: The depth of the flanger effect
center-pot-function: The rate of the LFO (low-frequency oscillator) controlling the flanger
right-pot-function: Feedback of the effect.  When the pot is at 12:00, the                      feedback is zero.  Full left is -1.0 and full right is 1.0.
right-switch-function: Tap this switch to set the rate of the flanger
